segments.text: What kind of strong suit do you get ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am accomplished in English and computer . Besides , I've got a Teacher's Certificate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to be an instructor in the future ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I regard instructor as a decent occupation and I love to be an instructor .
segments.speaker: S2
